org.anyframe.xp.query
Interface XPActionCommand

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultXPActionCommand
public interface XPActionCommand

This is an interface class for adding the business logic before/after manipulating the database at XPQueryService use. Recommand to use XPQueryService for manipulating the database in developing the presentation layer using the XPlatform which is a X-internet solution of the TOBE Software company. When we change the DataSet's value which is XPlatform's data format, we add the needed logic for implementation class of XPActionCommand's class.

Author:
Soyon Lim, JongHoon Kim
